column4: how are your speakers hooked up?  through spdif port?  digital?
my rear speakers do not work,i can not get sound from them,but front speakers are working
how are they hooked up?  with digital or analog?
can you open the volume app(speaker icon on your menu bar.
try the preference pane in there.  sometimes you need to enable them in there.
i tried ,but i could not find any settings about 4 or more channels
so there is multiple outputs on your sound card for rear speakers and LFE and such?  and they are analog?  what kind of source are you using, DVD?
i just wanna listen mp3s with my sound system,in windows all my speakers work flawless,but in ubuntu only two front speakers and subwoofer are working
which program are you playing your mp3s from?
check the settings in there maybe there is an option to output to all speakers?  sorry i dont know amarok well..
yes i checked it too,but no luck
i have HDA VIA VT82xx on my motherboard
open a terminal.  and run alsamixer  and check settings in there.
i did it,but there is no option about multichannle settings in alsamixer
